subject: Re: Gift of Life Australia website interim update

full_threads.body:
Hi Richard,

Happy Friday.

Just a quick update on where things are at:
  • The Our Team page is now live with your latest updates:
    giftoflife.org.au/our-team
  • For the slideshow, our dev team will first check the back end to make sure everything is stable
  • Once that’s confirmed, we’ll go ahead and publish the slideshow so the page doesn’t break
  • Currently checking out the gallery pages 🙏

Let me know if there's anything else, always happy to help.

Thanks Allie, the slightly updated Our Team is attached with tracked changes.

That is fine in principle for the slide show (1.5 hrs) and I hope to have the gallery images (and slide show images) later this week.

Thanks again for all your help,

Kind regards,

Richard

Hi Richard,

You’re very welcome, glad I could help!

Wishing you a great weekend as well.
Thanks so much - have a great weekend.

Hi Richard,

Happy Friday and thanks again for the call earlier!

Just confirming I’ve made the updates based on your notes:
  • Pages updated with docs:
    • Cord Blood
    • About
    • FAQ
  • Attached the “Our Team” docs so you can access them directly.
  • Removed Izaack Powell and Match for Murray from the News section.
  • Made the Wolper logo and Australian Tissue Donation Network logo consistent in size across the page.

For the logo, I’ll have that ready for you next week.

For the slideshow, it may take a bit longer, around 1 hour and 30 minutes, since we’ll need to test it first on staging before publishing it to live to ensure there are no bugs.

For the gallery, I’ll wait for the images from you before making changes.

Let me know if there’s anything else I can do for you , always happy to help!

Hi Allie, some minor amendments here but I can't seem to open the one called Our Team.

Thanks,

Richard

Hi Richard,

Thank you so much for the call earlier, really appreciate you taking the time.

I've attached the Word pages with the recent changes, I've applied

Let me know if there’s anything you'd like adjusted or if I missed anything, happy to tweak as needed!
no worries- I've called richard today

Hi Allie - could you please substitute this 'page' for the current wording.

Also, could you please give me a call when you have spare moment?

Thanks !

Hi Allie. Many thanks. Going through it now. There is some minor editing to be done (not a problem created by you!) is it easy for you to send me the pages in a Word-type format to track changes or mark up for you to work form?

Thanks
Richard

Hi Richard,

Happy Thursday! Hope your week’s going well.

Just a update to let you know I’ve made some updates to the following pages:

  • Our Team: https://giftoflife.org.au/our-team/
  • About: https://giftoflife.org.au/about/
  • Cord Blood: https://giftoflife.org.au/cord-blood/
    → I noticed the site links in the doc weren’t working, so I linked directly to the Royal Hospital for Women – Randwick. For the others, I used the links from the doc, but couldn’t access their sites on my end.
  • FAQ: https://giftoflife.org.au/faq/
    → Could you double-check the “here” link under “Will my personal information be kept private and secure?” and let me know if it’s pointing to the right place?

Also, on this page:
https://giftoflife.org.au/information-for-donors/

I changed the heading “How donations work” from a period to a colon, just to better signal that more info follows. Happy to revert to the original if you’d prefer that.

All sorted on my side - just let me know if anything needs tweaking. Always happy to help!
